task.summary: Added new tester file pdfs Realised textract wasn't going to work - I think it only works for Py2.
Got pdf text extraction working with PyPDF2 Started reading all the text in the file
Now can read text from the file, and usually split it by Sections and then by individual questions
Added some debugging logs to print to the console
Got regex to correctly split different questions numbers, however the answers are still in the same string
Started to flesh out the QuestionPaper object, with init and .read() methods
Improved docs on regex, QuestionPaper Class Added all the code into the QuestionPaper class, but haven't tested yet
Code commenting, and refactoring it to be more readable
Fine tune the QuestionPaper class Add more file examples
Create MD depiction of Question Paper
Implemented pytesseract OCR, it's much better
Processed pdfs now get saved in text form
Reformat to process larger datasets easily
Generated Bar and Pie graphs, Added todos
Add documentation strings to a few methods in main.py
Made code work better with separate projects
Updated gitignore to not ignore the test_files folder

expression.expression-string: print("Processing {} (file {} out of {})... ".format(filename, i, len(filenames)), end="") text.append(pytesseract.image_to_string(PILImage.open(filename))) print("Done")
